category: Public Architectural Review Committee Regulations/Article 11 (Meeting Management)
contents: Article 11 (Meeting Management) Committee meetings are not open to the public. However, minutes of meetings including the following matters must be prepared and kept, and may be recorded or videotaped when the committee deems necessary. 1. Meeting date and location 2. List of committee members attending the meeting 3. Deliberation agenda and contents 4. Resolution results
